modName: Arnold as Conan the Barbarian in Skyrim
summary: My attempt to create a Conan who looks like Arnold Schwarzenegger
descriptionHtml:
Update 2.0
I added a face configuration file for my version 2.0 of my Arnold as Conan the Barbarian.
Look at the Pictures of vers. 2.0

Use Console and type \"showracemenu\". 
Please note the references are located in the Configuration File to change your character.

to get the look of Vers.2.0 you will need the following Mod

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces -
USE the optional file [BetterMales - Nudes - NoMoreBlockyFaces v2-0]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

Telthalions Finer Hair standard version
by Thelhalion                                     
(http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2207)

Conan the barbarian Outfits 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4793



Update:
I added a face configuration file, so you can alter your own character, so he looks like my version of Arnold as Conan. 
Use Console and type \"showracemenu\". 
Please note the references are located in the Configuration File to change your character.

My attempt to create a Conan who looks like Arnold Schwarzenegger. 
I use the follow mods for vers. 1.0

No More Blocky Faces by Xenius           ( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=30 )

Detailed Faces v2 by Xenius                  ( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26 )

Detailed Lips by Xenius                        ( http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=689 )

Telthalions Finer Hair standard version
by Thelhalion                                     (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2207)

Conan the barbarian Outfit - http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4793



Its the first time i upload a file. Hope it will work and you will enjoy. Feel free to edit the face via console. Perhaps you can do a better Version.
author: Fruchtzwerg
